name: Bloops Game
summary:
A secret of the universe, hidden inside a riddle. Can you find it?
BloOp!
Out of the void, mysterious particles have appeared.
Some are slow, others fast, some are crazy, and some are spooky!
Pop all BloOps before time runs out.
A good pop will earn you time, a bad pop will steal it from you. And beware the black hole!
